oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Remarks concerning copies of Bushman Paintings, given by Colonel Durnfold to His Excellency Sir Bartle Frere. By /han kass o (L VIII.
8004). The mode of shooting practised by the |n sa Bushmen. By /han kass'o (L VIII.
7974). |han kass'o identifies and describes various groups of people (as they appear in a copy of rock painting no. 2).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Notes on rock painting copy no. 2 (!nu'sa and other groups)
